content:
# The error indicates that I no longer have any iron ore in my inventory to insert into the furnace. 
# It seems that I had previously extracted all the iron plates and did not account for the iron ore that was used in the smelting process.

# Currently, I have:
# - 7 iron plates
# - 22 wood
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone

# To proceed, I need to gather more iron ore to continue producing the required iron plates for the assembling machine.
# Let's locate and harvest more iron ore.

iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Finding the nearest iron ore resource
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Moving to the iron ore resource position
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvesting more iron ore

# After harvesting, I will check the inventory to see the updated resources.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Inspecting the updated inventory after harvesting iron ore
